price: 于此经之前，以作世人的向导；又降示证据。不信安拉的迹象的人，必定要受严厉的刑罚。安拉是万能的，是惩恶的。
arabic: مِن قَبۡلُ هُدٗى لِّلنَّاسِ وَأَنزَلَ ٱلۡفُرۡقَانَۗ إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ لَهُمۡ عَذَابٞ شَدِيدٞۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَزِيزٞ ذُو ٱنتِقَامٍ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Muhammad Makin
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Chinese by Muhammad Makin. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: min qablu hudan lilnnāsi wa-anzala al-fur'qāna inna alladhīna kafarū biāyāti al-lahi lahum ʿadhābun shadīdun wal-lahu ʿazīzun dhū intiqāmin
